form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Grassley (for himself and Mr. Schumer) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to make permanent the extension of the Medicare-dependent hospital (MDH) program and the increased payments under the Medicare low-volume hospital program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Rural Hospital Access Act of 2015.

section.header: Extension of the Medicare-dependent hospital (MDH) program

subsection.text: Section 1886(d)(5)(G) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395ww(d)(5)(G)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in clause (i), by striking , and before April 1, 2015; and

Section 1886(b)(3)(D) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395ww(b)(3)(D)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in the matter preceding clause (i), by striking , and before April 1, 2015; and
in clause (iv), by striking through fiscal year 2014 and the portion of fiscal year 2015 before April 1, 2015 and inserting or a subsequent fiscal year.

paragraph.text: Section 13501(e)(2) of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1993 (42 U.S.C. 1395ww note) is amended by striking fiscal year 2000 through the first 2 quarters of fiscal year 2015 and inserting a subsequent fiscal year.

section.header: Extension of the increased payments under the Medicare Low-Volume Hospital Program
